name: Your bedroom.
description: An unmade bed stands in the corner. A wardrobe is next to the door, unused, with a pile of clothes in front of it. There is a small table next to the bed holding some of your adventuring equipment. A door to the north leads out of the bedroom.

name: Your living room.
description: A small room with a table and chairs in the middle. Through the windows you can see the front gate and a garden. To the west you can see your kitchen and north is the door that leads outside. Your bedroom door is south.

name: Your kitchen.
description: A fireplace with a small chimney is on the back wall with a pot hanging over it. The warmth form the fire is pleasant. You can see your living room to the east.

name: In front of your small cabin.
description: A short, paved path leads north to your front gate. To the south is the door to your hut and east is your garden.

name: On the path outside your gate.
description: The gate to you cabin creaks in the wind to the south. In the distance to the east you can see the village. To the west is a pond.

name: Your garden.
description: A few fruit trees line the fence and along the wall of the cabin there is a vegatable garden.

name: On the path towards town.
description: To the east you can see the general store and the town beyond. To the west stands your cottage.

name: Outside a general store.
description: The village's general store stands before you. There are some wares outside on stands and the door is open. To the west, a path leads out of town.

name: On the path towards the pond.
description: To the west you can see the pond and sound of ducks can be heard. The path to the east leads to your cottage.

name: Beside the pond.
description: A pond is before you. The rushes growing around the edges sway in the breeze. A family of ducks plays on the water. The path leads east.
